title: Rufus Griscom, Heleo CEO
description:
In an episode that originally aired on Recode Decode, Heleo CEO Rufus Griscom talks with Peter Kafka about trying to build a "BuzzFeed for brains" that can distribute Big Ideas to the broader Internet. He also talks about how much things have changed since he launched his first media startup, Nerve.com, in 1997.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
